headline: Deckers Leans On UGG And HOKA Launches To Support Growth Narrative
summary: UGG, a Deckers Outdoor brand, has launched its Spring 2026 clogs and mules campaign featuring global rap star Central Cee and Olympic champion Su Yiming. HOKA, also under Deckers Outdoor, introduced the next-generation Speedgoat 7 trail shoe with performance-focused features and a global running challenge. Deckers Outdoor (NYSE:DECK) sits at the intersection of lifestyle and performance footwear, with UGG and HOKA as two of its key brands. The latest UGG campaign leans on high-profile...
